job_description:

key_requirements: TensorFlow, SciPy, Scikit-learn for ML fundamentals
Flask & Streamlit for deploying APIs/interactive apps
Real-world project experience (e.g., fraud detection, forex analysis, sales forecasting)
Turning data into meaningful insights and business value
Graduates in STEM, computer science, or analytics
job_analysis.selected_projects_reasoning: Selected 'DocuCare AI' as it directly showcases advanced AI/ML capabilities (LLMs, RAG, vector embeddings) for data extraction and insight generation from unstructured medical documents, which aligns with 'turning data into meaningful insights'. The use of Python-based AI pipelines is a direct match. 'Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)' was chosen for its strong emphasis on Python, Flask (a key technology mentioned in the JD for API deployment), data scraping, PostgreSQL for structured data management, and the development of a data-driven matching engine. This demonstrates practical application of core data science concepts and tools. Finally, 'FlowerGen' from the generic CV is crucial as it demonstrates hands-on experience with Generative AI models (Stable Diffusion, LoRA) and Python, highlighting machine learning fundamentals and performance optimization, which are vital for an AI/ML focused data science role. These three projects collectively cover a wide array of requested skills from data processing and analysis to advanced AI model development and deployment.

tailored_cv.professional_summary: Highly motivated Master's student in Artificial Intelligence (expected 2026) with a strong foundation in Python for data analysis, machine learning, and generative AI. Passionate about transforming complex data into meaningful insights and building efficient, scalable AI-powered solutions. Eager to apply practical experience in developing AI pipelines, implementing machine learning models (e.g., Stable Diffusion, LLMs), and deploying data applications with frameworks like Flask, to contribute effectively to data science challenges. Committed to continuous learning and delivering high-quality, data-driven results.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence

other_degrees.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
other_degrees.university: Vivekanand Education Society‚Äôs Institute of Technology, Mumbai, India

experience.title: Salesforce Administrator Intern
achievements: Automated Salesforce workflows and validation rules, enhancing data accuracy by 20% and ensuring data integrity for reporting.
Designed data-driven dashboards for travel management modules, providing enhanced reporting and visibility into key metrics.
Collaborated cross-functionally to translate business requirements into scalable, data-aware solutions, improving system efficiency.

experience.title: Technology Foundations Virtual Experience
achievements: Completed an end-to-end Agile SDLC simulation using DevOps and automation tools, applying best practices.
Debugged and optimised Python scripts, significantly improving runtime efficiency by 30% for data processing tasks.
Presented algorithmic solutions and data flow diagrams, enhancing technical communication for complex data-driven processes.

projects.title: DocuCare AI - AI-Powered Medical Document Management System
projects.description: A modern web application leveraging AI for intelligent medical document management and insights.
achievements: Developed a server-side AI pipeline leveraging Google Gemini 1.5 Flash for advanced OCR and intelligent medical data extraction.
Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chat system using vector embeddings for accurate and context-aware querying of health records.
Architected a robust and free-tier compatible backend infrastructure using Supabase for scalable data storage and management.
Built a dynamic frontend with Next.js 14 App Router and Server Actions to securely display and interact with AI-processed medical data.

projects.title: Smart Student Job Agent Platform (Unihustle)
projects.description: A comprehensive job aggregation and matching platform for students, automating local search based on availability and skills.
achievements: Engineered a sophisticated job matching engine using Python and weighted vectors to precisely align student skills and availability with job requirements.
Developed asynchronous background worker pipelines with Celery and Redis to efficiently scrape and process external job board data without impacting performance.
Designed a normalized PostgreSQL schema with SQLAlchemy ORM for robust and scalable management of job, student, and skill data.
Deployed a high-performance API using Flask to serve real-time job data to a reactive frontend, ensuring seamless user experience.

projects.title: FlowerGen | Text-to-Image Generation System
projects.description: Generative AI model for realistic text-to-image generation.
achievements: Built a generative AI model using Stable Diffusion and LoRA for realistic text-to-image generation.
Optimised GPU training on RTX 3050, reducing memory use by 25% and accelerating model development.
Integrated real-time data pipelines to enhance interactive user experience and model output.
